amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in the Congressional Record to add an exclusion paragraph stating that the plan in paragraph (1) shall not include any tracts where oil or gas production would harass or take a North Atlantic Right Whale.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add an exclusion paragraph stating that the plan in paragraph (1) shall not include any tracts where oil or gas production would harass or take a North Atlantic Right Whale.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 218 (Roll no. 72).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Ms. Ross.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 218 (Roll no. 72).
